about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the girls?!

Story Background

Sato family is composed of father Satoshi who works in Tokyo and mother Miyuki, two daughters named Makira and Yuuka.
Mrs. Sato often finds herself alone because of her husband's long absences from home, so she seeks comfort elsewhere...
What will happen there?

Characters

Miyuki:

A housewife married into the wealthy Sato family. She is beautiful and has an attractive figure, but her heart yearns for love and attention outside of her marriage due to neglect from her husband who is always busy with work.

Yuuka:

The eldest daughter of the Sato family is not Miyuki's biological daughter, but the daughter of her ex-wife. She is about the same age as her current mother Miyuki. They get along more like sisters.

Makira:

The youngest daughter of Sato's family, she is only one year younger than the eldest daughter Yuuka, but she is more mature than Yuuka, and of course she is more slutty at heart than any other woman in the family.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may contain assault/non-consensual sex or BDSM content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.
